text:
- My team is in charge
of managing the security

of the containers and the
clusters that run our applications
across Warner Bros. Discovery Portfolio.
The biggest challenge was being able to
agentlessly integrate anomalous detection
within our infrastructure.

We picked Amazon GuardDuty
because it seamlessly integrates

with our infrastructure without
causing any disruptions.

And we're pairing that
with Amazon Detective to

be able to quickly identify
the root cause of the anomaly.

Before, the security engineers
had to take all the logs
from the services and the cloud plane

and put it on a SIM for
detecting anomalous activity.
This was a very tedious task

because of the complex
querying that was needed to
query the massive disjointed datasets.

Amazon GuardDuty allowed
us to seamlessly integrate
anomaly detection within our clusters,
and would run machine learning models,

and proactively give us
alerts that we'd have to

traditionally build
very complex query for.
It helped us to quickly scale out

anomaly detection across
all our infrastructure,

and allow us to scale pretty
quickly and efficiently.
(upbeat music)
